definition: A cosmetic product applied to the nails, typically in liquid form, to enhance their appearance or provide color. It is commonly used by individuals to paint their fingernails or toenails.

examples.german: Ich trage Nagellack auf meine Nägel auf.
examples.english: I apply nail polish to my nails.
What color is your nail polish?
She peeled off her nail polish.

examples.german: Ich habe Nagellackentferner benutzt, um den Nagellack zu entfernen.
examples.english: I used nail polish remover to remove the nail polish.
